channel.title: Loyalty Titles, Something Weird
channel.description:
I have just recently added loyalty title's but when I logged into my rsps testing to see whether it has worked or not, I found out it wasn't coming up with the title itself, It was coming up with "MyName" and then said "Skill 1"
[img]http://imgtool.in/img/screenshot1oyo.png[/img]
I used this tutorial/Snippet http://google.com/runescape-development/google/snippets/350858-adding-all-loyalty-titles-19.html
I followed everything correctly and that happened ^^

item.title: Loyalty Titles, Something Weird
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

Lol I followed that other guide and the same thing happened to me, When I have “Player-title = 0” my player’s combat level show’s up in green normally and then when I put “player-title = 1” it comes up saying “skill 1” instead of my combat level and the loyalty title on the other side, But I think I know where the problem is now

Edit: Nope no idea

Read full topic
